rules_text:
Attacking creatures you control have first strike.
Whenever three or more creatures you control die, Glorysinger deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
[i]“‘Of course we're gonna survive,' she said with a grim smile. ‘How else would I tell our story?'”
—Azamir, “Fall Of Golden Company”[/i]
notes: fluffy: +have, when>whenever, -dashgap, comma>period, flavour bar up
